comments:

where I find the following exception:

It could be reported in a nicer way.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 21294 ***

causedBy.message: The platform metadata area is already in use by another platform instance, or there was a failure in deleting the old lock file.  If no other platform instances are running, delete the  lock file (C:\eclipse\workspace\.metadata\.lock) and try starting the platform again.
